publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4205.1# Euan Robson: Closure of Borders CABx—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4205) in the name of Christine Grahame, leave out from "and therefore" to end and insert "; believes that Scottish Borders Council should change its decision not to meet the CABx’ request fully to fund its staff, and further believes that the council should meet with MSPs and the CABx’ steering group with a view to delivering resources commensurate with the needs of Borderers." Supported by: Jeremy Purvis*
S2M-4205.1# Closure of Borders CABx (lodged on 4 April 2006) Donald Gorrie*
